infotext: As professional information service providers, libraries distinguish themselves from conventional web providers through high quality standards and professionally verified content. Accordingly, it is particularly important that basic research is carried out correctly and comprehensibly. However, this is no longer the case if search technologies have been configured incorrectly, and search queries are consequently only processed in an apparently correct manner. To assist you in checking your web services, we have compiled a list of search queries here that should help you in this regard.

textkomponenten.placeholderSuchanfrage1: Enter search query here e.g. Schweiz
textkomponenten.placeholderSuchanfrage2: Enter search query here e.g. Zürich
textkomponenten.placeholderSuchanfrage3: Enter search query here e.g. Johannes
textkomponenten.placeholderSuchanfrage4: Enter search query here e.g. Johan
textkomponenten.placeholderSuchanfrage5: Enter search query here e.g. Johann
textkomponenten.placeholderSuchanfrage6: Enter search query here e.g. Johanna
textkomponenten.placeholderSuchanfrage7: Enter search query here e.g. Johannes
textkomponenten.placeholderSuchanfrage8: Enter search query here e.g. Müller-Jacquier
textkomponenten.tooltip1: Smallest value of A or B
textkomponenten.tooltip2: Smallest value of A or C
textkomponenten.tooltip3: Smallest value of B or C
textkomponenten.tooltip4: Value A + value B - value D
textkomponenten.tooltip5: Value D + value C - value E - value F
textkomponenten.tooltip7: Value D + value E - value F
textkomponenten.tooltip8: Value A + value B + value C + value D
textkomponenten.tooltip9: Value A + value B + value C + value D
textkomponenten.tooltip11: Value B + value C + value D
